description: This file declares the interface ILocalStore for local storage operations within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace, including methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type alias for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: Interface for a local storage mechanism with virtual methods for managing tables and entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the local storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries for a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table within a specified range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
